animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I'm known for my love of a certain nut.
🐘 I'm the largest land animal.
💧 I use my nose to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I like to climb trees.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🌿 I eat leaves.

animal.question: I live in the water and have sharp teeth. I'm a reptile. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐊 I spend a lot of time in the sun.
🦷 My bite is very powerful.
🌳 I can be found in swamps and rivers.

animal.question: I am black and white and live in herds. I look like a horse, but with stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My pattern is unique, like a fingerprint.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🐎 I am related to horses.

animal.question: I waddle and lay eggs. I love to swim in ponds and lakes. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I quack!
🌱 I eat plants and insects.
🥚 I build nests near water.

animal.question: I hop and have a pouch for my babies. I live in Australia. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am known for boxing.
🌿 I eat grass and plants.
👶 I carry my young in a special pocket.

animal.question: I have a sticky tongue and change colors to blend in. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦎 I am a reptile.
🦟 I love to eat insects.
🌴 I live in trees.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal hunter with excellent hearing. I hoot. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I am a bird of prey.
🌙 I am most active at night.
🐭 I eat rodents and small animals.

animal.question: I build dams and have large teeth. I live in the water and gnaw on trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am an engineer.
🇨🇦 I am Canada's national animal.
🏠 I build my home from branches and mud.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, what am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am often seen in winter.
⛷️ You can play in me and make snowballs.
☃️ You can build a person out of me.

weather.question: I’m water that falls from the sky. You might need an umbrella when I’m near. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I often come from clouds.
🌱 Plants need me to grow.
💧 I can fill up puddles.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunscreen when I am out.
🌻 Plants turn to face me.
🔆 I disappear when clouds cover me.

weather.question: I am strong and I can blow things around. I can be gentle or fierce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 Trees sway when I am around.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I can knock your hat off!

weather.question: I am a cloud that touches the ground, making it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌁 Driving can be difficult when I am present.
👻 I make things look blurry and mysterious.
🌫️ I am made of tiny water droplets.

weather.question: I am a big storm with swirling winds and heavy rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an 'eye' at my center.
🌊 I form over warm ocean waters.
🏠 People might have to evacuate when I come.

weather.question: I am a loud crash in the sky, often followed by a flash of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I am associated with thunderstorms.
⚡I travel faster than sound.
👂 You can hear me after you see the flash.

weather.question: I'm a funnel of fast-spinning wind that touches the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am very dangerous and destructive.
🐄 Animals may fly.
🌾 I often form during severe thunderstorms

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls as hard balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can damage cars and roofs.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
⛈️ I often fall during thunderstorms, but not always.

weather.question: I am a long period of very little or no rain, making the land dry. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ Plants and animals struggle during my reign.
🔥 Wildfires can start easily because of me.
💧 Water becomes very precious when I appear.
